name: DataTransferItemList
description: The DataTransferItemList object is a list of DataTransferItem objects representing items being dragged. During a drag operation, each DragEvent has a dataTransfer property and that property is a DataTransferItemList.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'DataTransferItemList' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.name: HTML 5.1
refs.description: The definition of 'DataTransferItemList' in the 'HTML 5.1' specification.
